DOC.brief_summary: To characterize clinical outcome Angio-Seal VIP St. Jude Medical ( SJM ) collagen collection device/procedure-related major vascular complication time hemostasis .
DOC.brief_title: Post-Market Study St. Jude Medical Angio-Seal™ V-Twist Integrated Platform ( VIP ) Vascular Closure Device
DOC.criteria: Patient require closure femoral artery puncture result arterial access procedure . Patient ≥18 year age . Patient willing provide write informed consent prior study device use . Patient willing able adhere data collection followup requirement . Patient participate another clinical trial potential impact hemostasis . Patient active groin infection systemic infection . Patient undergone vascular access procedure within past 90 day . Patient previously enrol study . ( For patient undergo multiple intervention within timeframe 90 day , initial procedure may constitute study enrollment . )
